tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I used to be truly afraid of the dentist, from the cost to the fear of pain. However, Dr. Senthil and all the staff have helped me over come that fear by clearly explaining procedures, answering all of my questions and making sure I am comfortable at each step of process. I have now entrusted them to do two implants, wisdom teeth extractions, a root canal, along with regular check ups. I have recommended Dentall care to both family and friends and would highly recommend them to anyone including those who are afraid of the dentist!

tags: Value for money,
review: Visited the clinic for my father's dental health.The doctor is friendly and explains issues clearly. However they dont provide proper payment receipts (bills have no GST in it). If you have a medical insurance and looking for proper payment bills and receipts for reimbursement then this clinic is not recommended! They also charge 1% service charge for debit cards and 2% for credit cards.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback. My clinic is at the best interest to provide good treatment and documentation to the patients and we have done the same to you. My staff  provided you the online generated practo bill and the treatment summary with my seal and signature on it. Private clinics doesn't require GST. All my patients who have insurance got their reimbursement with the bill and documents, what I have provided and the insurance company doesn't ask for GST number for the treatment. I think you better check with your insurance company. Regarding service charge, it's the bank charging from us, we don't profit out of it and in our best interest we are trying to resolve that sooner.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: None
review: Went for wisdom teeth problem. He examined all teeth and gave his opinion. In fact he was not forcing me to extract immediately. Simply suggested that tooth need to be extracted. That's really great. If he wants money he would have told to do it immediately. Really nice. I don't know about actual price in Chennai. So not commenting on price. Overall good experience.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: So the wisdom tooth extraction procedure went fine but the follow up and suture removal was not at all done in a professional way. I have reconfirmed with the clinic twice whether Dr senthil sir will be available and I had to postpone a day later and few mins bfr entering clinic I was told he was present. When I went it there was someone else saying sorry couldn't come today. I had to travel long and come for his appointment n later was so disappointed by this experience. Wouldn't want to go again. Never give false info saying doctor is present at the clinic or not. Period.
